title: Add a Women’s blue floral dress item (seeded) with matching photo asset

requirements.text: Update the backend seeded dataset in `backend/main.mo` (`_initializeShops`) to include exactly one new Women-category clothing item that is a blue dress with a floral pattern, so that searching with category=Women, itemType="Dress", color="Blue", pattern="Floral" returns this item and `getItemDetails` for the item returns at least one shop in the shops list.

quotes: on the category women add one blue dress with floral pattern

acceptanceCriteria: When the canister is initialized (shops list is empty), `_initializeShops` seeds a new ClothingItem with `category = #women`, `itemType = "Dress"`, `color = "Blue"`, and `pattern = "Floral"`.
Calling `searchItems(?#women, ?"Dress", ?"Blue", ?"Floral")` returns an array containing the newly seeded blue floral dress item.
Calling `getItemDetails(<new item name>)` returns the item and a non-empty shops array (at least one shop carries it).
The new item’s `photo` field is a non-empty string that starts with `/assets/generated/` and exactly matches the static filename added in REQ-32 (including extension).

requirements.text: Add a new static clothing photo image file for the newly seeded Women’s blue floral dress under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and ensure it loads successfully via direct browser URL `/assets/generated/<filename>` without a 404.

quotes: on the category women add one blue dress with floral pattern

acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/women_blue_floral_dress.dim_480x640.jpeg`.
Visiting `/assets/generated/women_blue_floral_dress.dim_480x640.jpeg` in the browser returns the image (no 404).
The backend seeded item added in REQ-31 references this image exactly as `photo = "/assets/generated/women_blue_floral_dress.dim_480x640.jpeg"`.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor with all logic in `backend/main.mo`.
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other `frontend.immutablePaths` listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Static images must be stored and served from `frontend/public/assets/generated` and referenced by URL paths starting with `/assets/generated/`.
nonGoals: Adding new UI screens or changing the navigation flow.
Adding new categories beyond the existing set (Men/Women/Kids/Casual/Bridal).
Implementing new backend APIs beyond updating seed data and the new item/photo reference.

required: Photo of a women’s blue floral dress on a neutral background (women_blue_floral_dress.dim_480x640.jpeg)
